overview:
Michael C. Wright was voted among the top 100 rising stars in the capital markets under 40 years old by Financial News, Dow Jones in November 2006 and 2007.

He splits his time between Tower Gate Capital, investment firm Arch Atlantic LLP concentrating on private equity real estate (PERE) and asset backed operational business acquisitions, and Formosa Films. Michael was a corporate lawyer at Clifford Chance and two other international law firms, where he dealt in mergers & acquisitions (domestic and cross- border), private equity transactions, joint ventures, demergers, reorganizations, and restructurings, and securities issues.
